title: Shiva The Supreme
description: Shiva the Supreme. This is the story of Lord Shiva told through vibrant pictures and crisp narrative. Each frame has been carefully constructed and aesthetically presented to draw you into Shiva's mesmerising story.  Drawn from the Shiva Maha Purana, this is an authentic yet simple rendering of the story of Shiva. It tells of His descent, of the creation of the world, and his personal life.  Om Namah Shivaya! Immerse yourself in Shiva's blessing...
author: Rachna Panchal
